snippet.title: DEEP SNOW DELIVERY Trailer
snippet.description:
DOWNLOAD : https://drenindoku.itch.io/deep-snow-delivery
Wishlist on Steam! : https://store.steampowered.com/app/3281970/Deep_Snow_Delivery/
Discord Server : https://discord.gg/AwEps6jWNU
Patreon : https://www.patreon.com/Drenindok

Humanity is on the brink of extinction due to a self-inflicted ice age. Navigate the frozen wastes in an ancient WW2 tank fitted with a storage bucket and claw arm. Collect and sell junk, make deliveries between underground settlements, navigate mountainous terrain, and buy upgrades to make your job easier. 

Thousands like you have tried and failed to undo humanity’s mistakes. Will your story be different?

Trailer song : https://youtu.be/3M95RnmZFFo?si=UHYuJCC45eiQ9eHw

I played this song : https://youtu.be/pz41Oh30iVI?si=BJeNJu6o6fQ-PoQM
on loop almost non-stop while making the game cause it perfectly fits the "melancholy epic but lonely adventure" vibe. I wanted SO BADLY to use it for the trailer but it would probably cost thousands to get the rights to it, so just pretend or listen to it while you play idk 😭
